verbose_text: We chose to block JNK as our previous experiments showed that JNK function is essential for the inducible expression of c-Fos and c-Jun, whereas MAPK function is necessary for both basal and inducible expression; and JNK selectively phosphorylates c-Jun.
evidence: block JNK as our previous experiments showed that JNK function is essential for the inducible expression of c-Fos and c-Jun                  , whereas MAPK function is necessary for both basal and inducible expression; and JNK selectively phosphorylates c-Jun
